record.dc:title: Little Pigeon River Valley
record.dc:description: Students depicted with numbers are 3. Stella Huff; 4. Crettie (Lucrettie) Reagan; 5. Maud Clabo lived with her aunt Ruth Clabo, swept up Teachers' cottage with Ethel Carr, 6. Cora Ogle Andy Ogle's daughter, 7. Lillian Reagan; 8. Bill Ogle; 9. Ephraim Maples; 10. Tom McCarter; 11. Jim Huff; 12. no name given; 13. Cora McCarter; 14. Rellie Maples; Rose Carr and Emma Maples are also present, although they are not labeled. They are the first two girls on the lower left of the photo.
